meanings.definition: A record or account of a journey or trip.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading travelogs about different countries.
meanings.sent2: She keeps a travelog of all her adventures around the world.
meanings.sent3: The library has a collection of travelogs that make me want to explore.
meanings.sent4: Her travelog was like a treasure map leading to exciting destinations.
meanings.sent5: The colorful illustrations in the travelog brought the stories to life.

meanings.definition: To write or create a travelog.
meanings.sent1: I want to travelogs about my upcoming road trip.
meanings.sent2: She loves to travelogs about her experiences in foreign lands.
meanings.sent3: He decided to travelogs about his daily commute to work.
meanings.sent4: She can travelogs with such detail that you feel like you're there.
meanings.sent5: The author will travelogs about her journey through the mountains.

meanings.definition: The act of documenting one's travels.
meanings.sent1: Keeping a travelogs helps me remember all the places I've been.
meanings.sent2: His travelogs are filled with photos and stories from his trips.
meanings.sent3: Documenting my travels in a travelogs makes me feel like a real explorer.
meanings.sent4: Her travelogs are like a personal diary of her adventures.
meanings.sent5: The travelogs on the shelf are a testament to the wanderlust of their owner.
